name: Russo Waller
review: Buying experience Royal enfield always puts its customers as a priority, and the company is itself a connection to Indian youngsters. Easy-going and smooth procedures overall result in fast delivery.

name: Stanton Cook
review: Meteor serves best in all formats like looks design comfort cruising etc. If you are looking for lesser vibration with perfect cruiser for city abd long drive then go for it

name: Guy Humphrey
review: Bike is Really comfortable. I always enjoy my ride specially on smooth roads. Good ground clearance. Exhaust sound is also good. Bike has minimal vibration comparatively to Thunderbird. I am getting Mileage of 36 Km/Lt. I am quite Satisfied by my bike.

name: Virgie Gamble
review: I like its sound and performance it provides I wanted it from a long time and i got it and i was very happy because i loved royal enfield all models and this model was my favorite one its colour and mileage is superb and the looks of this bike is too nice

name: Weiss Adkins
review: Excellent motorcycle from RE, after owning cl 350 & Jawa 42, brought this , extremely happy with the decision , very composed ride quality , smooth gear shift, 0 vibration.Very good road presents, very cheap to maintain, excellent fuel efficiency in city and highway

name: Madden May
review: My friend got this bike few months ago, we went on long rides in the nature and this bike was absolutely amazing. The feel it gave was marvellous. We clicked some photos too and the bike looked fantastic! wherever we went on the bike people would just stare at us without giving us a break. I could see that every person looked desperate to get on the bike and ride it.
